-=I'm pretty darn sure that's not my Roxana. But, how very very odd.-=-

Sandra

messages.subject: Roxana Sorooshian discovered, from July 2008
messages.msgSnippet: But times are hard, even for drama queens. When it comes to putting posteriors on theatre seats, any bum will do. Very nice writing.
messages.messageBody:
"But times are hard, even for drama queens. When it comes to putting
posteriors on theatre seats, any bum will do."

Very nice writing.

http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_qn4156/is_20080713/ai_n27919922

Pam, how's it Roxana had something cool published and you didn't tell
us all?

Your modesty is making me have to discover things like this and your
blog by doing my own searches. Don't be so modest!

Your friend,
Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
